resources.string: Before we start, here are things you should know:
- Please be honest when making your choice.
- We are just doing a research so you don\'t have to fake your information.
- Please follow the step we designed for you and don\'t skip any questions.
Scan the code on SvyU website
Unable to connect to the internet.
This survey uses features not available in this version of the app. Please update the app.
There\'s a problem connecting to the service. Please check your connection or contact support.
Something unexpected happened sending your answers. Please contact support.
We need phone status permission to anonymously identify you.
We need location permission to anonymously identify you.
We need Internet permission to get surveys and send your results.
We need Internet permission to send and receive request.\nPlease grant this permission.
Please grant camera permission so we can scan a QR code.
Device Admin permission revoked. We will not be able to lock your phone after survey completion.
This option is not available because Device Admin is disabled.
Enable Device Admin so we can lock the phone after survey completion.
Enables device locking after completing survey.
- We will need to use your camera to scan a QR code. We also need phone and location permission to anonymously identify you. Please grant these permissions to help the survey.
